metadata.title: CVE-2020-16154 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
The App::cpanminus package 1.7044 for Perl allows Signature Verification Bypass.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-16154` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cpanminus - 1.7045-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cpanminus package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.7045-1').
